DOC.brief_summary: Clostridium Butyricum might be an effective drug in treating irritable bowel syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Clostridium Butyricum in Treating Irritable Bowel Syndrome
DOC.criteria: the presence of Rome III criteria for IBS ; Aged between 18 and 65 years old Antibiotic, probiotic or laxative usage within 4 weeks. organic gastrointestinal diseases Severe systematic disease: diabetes mellitus, hepatic, renal or cardiac dysfunction, thyroid disease or tumor etc. pregnancy or lactation. previous major or complicated abdominal surgery. severe endometriosis and dementia
